name: Roll The Squirrel (GMTK 2022)
description:
This game is just a thing I made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, and of course it's a 2D platformer because that's the only thing I know how to make and god knows I'm not going to figure out a whole new game genre in just 48 hours.

[SHAMELESS PLUG IN YAY]
If you want to check out my full project, that has been in development for nearly 5 months now, then check this link: https://screaming-trash-can.itch.io/bg! It's completely free, and completely impossible to give me your monetary possessions even if you did want to hand out your life savings to random strangers!

 
(Gee, I sure hope this doesn't get taken down because it has a link to a DIFFERENT GAME)
